title: Korean client issue
body: Can someone please tell me why the Korean client doesn't work anymore. Every other language works except for Korean before I launch it i get an error that does not go away it was working like normal last patch? Can someone help me please!!

replies.body: Because you need a korean ID to access korea
Hey Talon, I have been using the Korean client for months now. It's just for some reason, this patch it has now stopped working and I don't know what to do. It was always working?? Any ideas??

Maybe the transition period from the old client to the new one has started updating the files, you should try going into where you change the language and region in the riot games folder and change it again, if not, idk.
What do you mean exactly? I have changed it several times and still no luck. I am still on the old client.

at the moment you are not allowed to have a functionally working client from oce, euw, eune, na, etc (normal all access client) as well as a korean client, for your korean client too work you need to remove the other client and all of its data and attachments, purging your computer of all things league related then installing the other client is your ~~best ~~ easiest option.
So you want me to delete lol again and all files re install it on new client and change the locale script again?
aye wipe the entire game, tis only way, then you cannot download your normal client if you want to use the korean
